description: Internal unique identifier for each equipment subtype record; used as the primary key.
System date/time of create or last update, stored as a compact numeric string (yyyymmddhhmmssmmm-style). Timezone/precision likely system-dependent; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the equipment subtype or configuration (e.g., drive type, body style, fuel). Used in selection lists and reports.
Short alphanumeric code representing the equipment subtype for system use and reporting; often an abbreviation. May not be unique across all types; confirm constraints with SME.
Identifier of the parent equipment type/category this subtype belongs to; foreign key to the equipment type table.
Metadata indicating the referenced entity for equiptype; likely stores the target table/column name used by generic foreign-key logic; confirm with SME.
Identifier from a prior/legacy system to support migration, cross-reference, or data lineage; may be null for new records.
Name of the source legacy table associated with the legacy key for this record; used for historical traceability; may be null.
